channel.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3
channel.description:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gByXNYpfWSE[/youtube]
[b]Release Date:[/b] March the 5th 2013
[b]New Features:[/b]
[ul]Playable as all Jinjuriki Playable as all the Tailed Beasts (awakening form) Playable as Darui Playable as Hanzo of the Salamander Playable as Kurama Naruto (nine tails completely controlled) Added Combos All new scaled boss fights (now bigger and better) Playable as Tobi (edo) Playable as Madara[/ul]
[b]Features still yet to be confirmed:[/b]
[ul]Playable as all the Seven Ninja Swordsmen of the Mist Playable as Kinkaku and Ginkaku Playable as Black and White Zetsu (considering he hasn't been in any of the other games I think its about time he is)[/ul]
What are your expectations for this game? Mine are very high considering that generations was a big step but it still wasn't enough, the gameplay was horrible and hopefully they will learn from their mistakes. I really hope that they do have Madara and Tobi (ninja war costume) but that is just my opinion. What is yours?

item.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Has anyone got the information about the Kages, 7 swordsmen and the cloud w/e being in a DLC? Namco Bandai have acknowledged this but idk if it was still confirmed.

[quote=“LilXCj, post:25, topic:480124”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=598360.msg4254830#msg4254830 date=1362546080]
I don’t read the manga and I plan on using the game to get ahead of the anime so I hope it goes well.
[/quote]

You should really read the manga.[/quote]
Ain’t nobody got time for dat!

Read full topic

item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Welp, online sucks in this game, just saying. Tailed beast bombs deal at least half of a health bar and you can’t dodge them without a sub. Also, Madara is cheap as hell and is annoying the crap out of me.

item.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:14, topic:480124”]No spoilers until Friday please guys.

Not out for me for a few days. Not sure if I want to hold off with this and get Arma 3 though. Disappointed that you cant be the 7 ninja swordsmen yet though, or Kinkaku or Ginkaku

In my opinon, it’s a MAJOR improvement off of Storm 2, and especially Generations. It’s kinda hard to explain without actual visuals, because I suck at explaining things.

One question. Considering Hashirama was weak as love on Generations, is he at least a bit stronger? Also Madara, is he the badass he is meant to be?[/quote]Haven’t tried either yet, but from the gameplays I’ve seen they both look very good. I personally don’t plan to use Madara at all though… [size=1pt]he uses his susanoo in his movesets, using melee attacks at a mid distance. I hate it tbh.[/size]

Read full topic
